ED_Title: Question of the Comorian island of Mayotte
ED_DecisionText:
At its 96th plenary meeting on 8 September 2017, the General Assembly decided to defer consideration of the item entitled “Question of the Comorian island of Mayotte” and to include it in the draft agenda of its seventy-second session.

(See A/71/PV.96)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of this decision will be contained in document A/71/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
